languages.text: {n}Женщина, уже сделавшая глоток из стакана, давится и торопливо прочищает горло.{/n} "{name}! {name} фон Валанциус... мое глубочайшее, нижайшее почтение, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Ваша Светлость{/d}! Никогда представить себе не могла, что в "Амасекусе" буду стоять у стойки рядом с настоящим, храни нас Бог-Император, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольным Торговцем{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Женщина, уже сделавшая глоток из стакана, давится и торопливо прочищает горло.{/n} "{name}! {name} фон Валанциус... мое глубочайшее, нижайшее почтение, ваша милость! Никогда представить себе не могла, что в "Амасекусе" буду стоять у стойки рядом с настоящим, храни нас Великий, Вольным Торговцем!"

languages.text: {n}The woman, after taking a sip from her glass, chokes and quickly clears her throat.{/n} "{name}! {name} von Valancius... my deepest, humblest regards, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}! I never would've imagined I'd be standing at the bar in the Amasecus next to an honest-to-God-Emperor {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}!"
languages.original_text: {n}Женщина, уже сделавшая глоток из стакана, давится и торопливо прочищает горло.{/n} "{name}! {name} фон Валанциус... мое глубочайшее, нижайшее почтение, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Ваша Светлость{/d}! Никогда представить себе не могла, что в "Амасекусе" буду стоять у стойки рядом с настоящим, храни нас Бог-Император, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольным Торговцем{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman, having already sipped from her glass, chokes and quickly clears her throat.{/n} "{name}! {name} von Valancius... my deepest, humblest regards, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I never would've imagined I'd be standing at the bar in the Amasecus next to an honest-to-the-Exalted-One Rogue Trader!"

{n}The woman, having already sipped from her glass, chokes and quickly clears her throat.{/n} "{name}! {name} von Valancius... my deepest, humblest regards, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I never would've imagined I'd be standing at the bar in the Amasecus next to an honest-to-the-Exalted-One Rogue Trader!"

I never would've imagined I'd be standing at the bar in the Amasecus next to an honest-to-the-Exalted-One Rogue Trader!"

{n}The woman, after taking a sip from her glass, chokes and quickly clears her throat.{/n} "{name}! {name} von Valancius... my deepest, humblest regards, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I never would've imagined I'd be standing at the bar in the Amasecus next to an honest-to-the-Exalted-One Rogue Trader!"

{n}The woman, after taking a sip from her glass, chokes and quickly clears her throat.{/n} "{name}! {name} von Valancius... my deepest, humblest regards, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I never would've imagined I'd be standing at the bar in the Amasecus next to an honest-to-the-God-Emperor {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}!"

languages.text: {n}女性はグラスから一口飲むとむせて、すぐに咳払いをした。{/n}「{name}！{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様…お会いできて光栄だよ、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}陛下{/d}！まさかアマセッカスのバーで、神帝陛下の信託を受けた正真正銘の{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}に会えるなんて想像もしていなかった！」
languages.original_text: {n}The woman, after taking a sip from her glass, chokes and quickly clears her throat.{/n} "{name}! {name} von Valancius... my deepest, humblest regards, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}! I never would've imagined I'd be standing at the bar in the Amasecus next to an honest-to-God-Emperor {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}女性はグラスから一口飲むとむせて、すぐに咳払いをした。{/n}「{name}！{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様…お会いできて光栄だよ、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}陛下{/d}！まさかアマセッカスのバーで、神帝陛下の信託を受けた正真正銘の{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}に会えるなんて想像もしていなかった！」

languages.text: {n}女子立刻被刚刚喝下的一口酒呛住了，连忙清了清喉咙。{/n}“{name}！{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯……向你致以最深切、最崇高的敬意，{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}大人{/d}！我从未想过，自己能在烈酒修会的吧台前遇到神皇忠实的仆人，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人！{/g}”
languages.original_text: {n}The woman, after taking a sip from her glass, chokes and quickly clears her throat.{/n} "{name}! {name} von Valancius... my deepest, humblest regards, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}! I never would've imagined I'd be standing at the bar in the Amasecus next to an honest-to-God-Emperor {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}女子立刻被刚刚喝下的一口酒呛住了，连忙清了清喉咙。{/n}“{name}！{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯……向你致以最深切、最崇高的敬意，大人！我从未想过，自己能在烈酒修会的吧台前遇到神皇忠实的仆人，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}！”

languages.text: {n}La femme s'étouffe après avoir bu une gorgée de son verre et s'éclaircit rapidement la gorge.{/n} « {name} ! {name} von Valancius... Je vous présente mes plus respectueux hommages, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Votre Seigneurie{/d} ! Par l'Empereur-Dieu, je n'aurais jamais imaginé croiser {mf|un authentique|une authentique} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} au bar de l'Amasecus ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The woman, after taking a sip from her glass, chokes and quickly clears her throat.{/n} "{name}! {name} von Valancius... my deepest, humblest regards, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}! I never would've imagined I'd be standing at the bar in the Amasecus next to an honest-to-God-Emperor {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La femme s'étouffe après avoir bu une gorgée de son verre et s'éclaircit rapidement la gorge.{/n} « {name} ! {name} von Valancius... Je vous présente mes plus respectueux hommages, Votre Seigneurie ! Par l'Empereur-Dieu, je n'aurais jamais imaginé croiser {mf|un authentique {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchand{/g}|une authentique {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g}} au bar de l'Amasecus ! »

languages.text: {n}La mujer, tras tomar un sorbo de su vaso, se atraganta y rápidamente se aclara la garganta.{/n} «¡{name}! {name} von Valancius... ¡Mis saludos más cordiales, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}{mf|milord|milady}{/d}! ¡Jamás imaginé que estaría en la barra del Amasecus con {mf|un|una} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} de verdad de la buena!».
languages.original_text: {n}The woman, after taking a sip from her glass, chokes and quickly clears her throat.{/n} "{name}! {name} von Valancius... my deepest, humblest regards, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}! I never would've imagined I'd be standing at the bar in the Amasecus next to an honest-to-God-Emperor {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer, tras tomar un sorbo de su vaso, se atraganta y rápidamente se aclara la garganta.{/n} «¡{name}! {name} von Valancius... ¡Mis saludos más cordiales, {mf|milord|milady}! ¡Jamás imaginé que estaría en la barra del Amasecus con {mf|un|una} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} de verdad de la buena!».

languages.text: {n}Die Frau verschluckt sich, nachdem sie von ihrem Glas genippt hat, und räuspert sich eilig.{/n} "{name}! {name} von Valancius ... ich ... ich grüße Euch, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}{/d}! Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass ich in einer Bar des Amasecus einmal neben einem waschechten {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} stehen würde!"
languages.original_text: {n}The woman, after taking a sip from her glass, chokes and quickly clears her throat.{/n} "{name}! {name} von Valancius... my deepest, humblest regards, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}! I never would've imagined I'd be standing at the bar in the Amasecus next to an honest-to-God-Emperor {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Frau verschluckt sich, nachdem sie von ihrem Glas genippt hat, und räuspert sich eilig.{/n} "{name}! {name} von Valancius ... ich ... ich grüße Euch, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass ich in einer Bar des Amasecus einmal neben einem waschechten {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} stehen würde!"

languages.original_text: {n}The woman, after taking a sip from her glass, chokes and quickly clears her throat.{/n} "!  von Valancius... my deepest, humblest regards, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I never would've imagined I'd be standing at the bar in the Amasecus next to an honest-to-the-God-Emperor Rogue Trader!"

languages.text: {n}Kadehinden aldığı yudum, kadının genzine kaçıyor; hızlıca boğazını temizliyor.{/n} "{name}! {name} von Valancius... En içten, en naçizane saygılarımı iletirim {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri{/d}! Tanrı İmparator çarpsın ki Amasekus'ta barda karşıma bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} çıkmasını asla beklemezdim!"
languages.original_text: {n}The woman, after taking a sip from her glass, chokes and quickly clears her throat.{/n} "{name}! {name} von Valancius... my deepest, humblest regards, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}{/d}! I never would've imagined I'd be standing at the bar in the Amasecus next to an honest-to-God-Emperor {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadehinden aldığı yudum, kadının genzine kaçıyor; hızlıca boğazını temizliyor.{/n} "{name}! {name} von Valancius... En içten, en naçizane saygılarımı iletirim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Tanrı İmparator çarpsın ki Amasekus'ta barda yanımda bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} görmeyi asla beklemezdim!"
